['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Execute research studies using a broad range of methods (e.g. moderating interviews, usability, focus groups, contextual evaluations, diary studies; design and program surveys) directly, in collaboration with other research staff, or using vendors.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with usability and accessibility.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proficient in MS Office suite – Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook; strong written and verbal communication skills for research communication and design recommendations.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Investigate and socialize new technology, processes, and/or research approaches.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with various stakeholders (e.g. product, design, development) to produce high quality, innovative designs that leverage research insights; contributes to the development of functional strategy.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Actively looking for ways to share insights with a broader internal audience on studies and latest industry trends.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Present findings and implications (from a single study or a combination of multiple studies and/or data sources) to stakeholder audience.', 'ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience driving best practices related to product research in their previous organization(s).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Data visualization and strong presentation skills (in addition to strong analysis skills) are key in this role to help support design decisions at scale.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Quant: Pull data from various sources using SQL and similar protocols.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working a problem from start to finish – defining the problem, identifying the data needed to address the problem, locating data, building the necessary model(s), and communicating the results.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to analyze data from various logical and experiential (e.g. phone, print, web) sources is required.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Define testable hypotheses that are relevant to the business and design approaches to addressing general user experience and product marketing questions.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Lead this initiative within the research team or ESI as a whole (e.g. accessibility, product market research, usability best practices).\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'POSITION SUMMARY', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Quant: Analyze data sets using appropriate statistical techniques and tools (e.g. R, Python), linking diverse sources where required.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in related field required.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience creating best practices related to data science in their previous organization(s) and experience taking a business problem, identifying necessary data, designing an approach to analyzing that data, completing analysis, and visualizing those results to their teams.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa08-10 years relevant experience or 4-8 years and Master’s or PhD Degree.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply knowledge of social science and ecommerce practices to create and refine UX metrics, user behavior models, and/or algorithms (including collaborating with other researchers to design research to augment quantitative results, identifying areas within products for instrumentation, etc.).', '\xa0', 'Location: St Louis, MO', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Quant: Knowledge of SQL, Excel, R or Python (or SPSS).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Turn quantitative insights into innovative solutions for future implementations', 'Duration: 09/07/2020 to 12/31/2020 Remote', 'QUALIFICATIONS', 'Apply expertise to new approaches – identifying new and unique ways to address UX challenges via collaboration, skill acquisition, or novel approaches to existing challenges.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Social science research methods (e.g. usability, surveys, observation), qualitative and quantitative data analysis, foundational statistics.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be a customer advocate, with a familiarity of competitive experiences and ESI research findings that you are able to apply toward evaluation of internal products and ensuring teams have a clear picture of the end users of the experience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Creating data visualizations (e.g. using Tableau, Excel, PowerPoint), presenting findings and implications to stakeholder audience; actively looking for ways to share insights with a broader internal audience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passion for customers and a demonstrated understanding of experience and conversion metrics is key.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to identify existing data sources, retrieve them, and work with teams to get new data sources implemented. Relationship building and maintenance are key to success in this function of the role.', 'The UX Researcher uses knowledge of social science and experience to lead analytical, experimental, investigative and other technical fact-finding work for defining feature behavior or enhancements for significant portions of the user experience supporting product development; solving unique and complex problems that have a broad impact on the business. The researcher will influence design and business strategy to create actionable research programs that address complex user experience and product definition questions.', 'Job Title: Product Strategy Advisor,(UX Researcher)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Mentor junior team members.']

job_title: UX Qualitative Researcher and Designer Contract to Permanent
job_text: ['', 'UX/UI Designer\xa0', '• Experience on usability test –usability test script, method, collect feedback and design improvement recommendations;', 'We are looking for 5+ years UX design experience with enterprise business applications; • Must have an online portfolio to be considered.', '• Highly creative and inquisitive; able to multitask effectively;', '• Stay on top of user/customer experience trends and best practices across interaction types (voice, chat, web, mobile);', '• IT experience within contact centers and healthcare environment highly preferred. Demonstrated understanding of business process as it relates to experience in the field.', '• Deep knowledge of user centered design processes and methodology;', '• Work closely with the Digital teams UX owners and design teams to ensure adherence is maintained with client UX policies through the application and manipulation of Pega Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)', 'Top Skills:', '• Create dynamic prototypes that can test and validate designs', '• Ability to create artifacts that illustrate how an app will look and work (e.g., wireframes, user flows, visual design comps, paper and interactive prototypes)', '• Provide user experience leadership and healthcare-specific user interface design guidance', '• Speak and write well, play well with others, and engage with internal business partners', 'Position Purpose: Drive user-centered research/usability studies that provide actionable insights which influence design and development.', '•Experience on user research, research strategy, user interviews, surveys and usability study. Builds personas, user journey map, empathy maps.', '• Self-motivated and able to work independently or as part of a agile team;', '• Proficiency with testing PDF Content to ensure it is accessible to assistive technology users and people with sensory and manual dexterity-related disabilities.', '• Familiarity with various techniques used by people with sensory and manual dexterity disabilities to navigate through and use web and digital document content.', "What we're looking for on the design side is:", '• Work with product owners and scrum teams to frame and communicate the achieved business goals and value to end users/customers', '• Experience in a fast-paced software environment, and an ability to execute against aggressive timelines;', '• Strong understanding of interface design principles; navigation and architecture; and typography, color, and layout principles', 'Collaborates and supports business areas and objectives that align to firm, division and department priorities and focus on member, provider and user centricity. Determines and recommends the most efficient and effective research approaches to solve for business needs and meet agreed-upon objectives, then guides business areas through the appropriate UX process.', 'Role Overview: The Qualitative Researcher is focused on performing & analyzing primary research with users, agents, and stakeholders. Activities may include ethnographic studies, user interviews, diary studies, and participatory design sessions. The goal of the Qualitative Researcher is to build artifacts like personas & journey maps that illustrate what the user/agent is doing today and what their goals are with using our applications. Level of Involvement: The Qualitative Researcher will be heavily involved for the first half of the Transformation project (100%), but reduce over time as the research is completed for the primary users and experiences (<50% after the first year).', '• Experience with Web Analytics Tag Managers and tag processes (such as Dynamic Tag Manager or Adobe Launch)', '• Experience in Agile methodologies;', '• Collaborate with technical team members', 'The candidate can work remote with travel required to St Louis once a month. The candidate will need to sit in a location that tied to an office. Locations can be St Louis, Sacramento, Woodland Hills, Tempe, Tampa, Buffalo, Charlotte, Detroit, or other cities where the client has an office.', 'Identifies and applies appropriate change management best practices and approaches to build rapport, understand user needs, address resistance and reinforce key learnings or results. Monitors UX project execution, including establishing and tracking UX project metrics and conducting evaluations.', '• Familiarity with standards-compliant voice and web design and the capabilities and constraints provided by CSS, JavaScript libraries, voice app frameworks, app frameworks, Salesforce app frameworks, mobile app frameworks, etc.', '• Ability to identify inaccessible web and digital document issues based on a high-level understanding of current Section 508 Standards and WCAG Success Criteria.', '• Proficient with use of VPAT tools for Section 508 and WCAG Success Criteria levels of compliance.', '• Able to effectively use one or more screen reader technologies to verify accurate remediation of inaccessible web and digital content.', '• Ability to think at a high level about product strategy and vision;', '• Experience on Interaction Design, interaction modeling, mental modeling. Creates user scenarios, user flow, low fidelity and high fidelity wireframes.', 'Top Skills:\xa0Execution of user-centered research and usability studies that provide actionable insights. Tracking UX project metrics and conducting evaluations. Expert in both qualitative and quantitative user experience research methodologies.', 'Leads strategic design and execution of user-centered research and usability studies that provide actionable insights which influence design and development of associate, branch team and client systems, tools, applications and processes.', '• High-level proficiency with automated testing tools and manual testing techniques that ensure compliance with current Section 508 Standards and WCAG Success Criteria.', '• Experience on UX analysis to conduct competitive analysis, market assessments and heuristic evaluations.', '• Advanced knowledge of wire framing and/or prototyping tools and methodologies;', '• Willingness to travel to contact center locations and collaborate with distributed delivery teams', 'Designs and executes user research using qualitative and quantitative methods.', '• Proficient with design tools such as Invision, Sketch, Figma, PegaCosmos Design System, Adobe Illustrator, XD OmniGraffle, Adobe tools, Balsamiq, IDEsorsimilar • Strong hands on knowledge on HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, Bootstrap, JQuery, JavaScript, OOJS, Angular JS 1.6 & 5', '• Experience on Information Architecture, taxonomies. Developing Service blueprints, Building information architecture, navigation schemas, search schemas and site map development.', '• Experience on speech and web analytics and feedback data to inform infrastructure changes and design.', 'We have a 12 month contract (potential contract to hire) for a UX Qualitative Researcher and Designer.', 'Summary of Characteristics We Need', 'Position Responsibilities:', 'Develop product prototypes involving wireframes, storyboards, site maps and screen flows based on user requirements and expectations. Present design concepts, including mockups and prototypes, to internal and external stakeholders to obtain user feedback and make design modifications as appropriate. Manage the process of styling and designing user stories and acceptance criteria. Conduct usability testing in order to see how users interact with products and improve the product based upon the results.', 'Identifies, influences, supports and partners with multi-disciplinary teams, including other business areas, to execute UX projects. Takes ownership for self-development, stays current with research techniques and tools in the field of UX. Works with and provides supporting documentation to others that influences product, system or application development and implementation to ensure creation of efficient, sustainable and successful results. Mentors and assists the UX Researchers as it relates to similar UX project needs. Assists leadership with strategic planning, resource allocation and guidance to UX associates. Gather, evaluate, and define user workflows and requirements.', '• Knowledge of VXML/HTML/CSS/JavaScript; ability to speak to developers about front-end in their language.', 'Role Overview: The primary function of the UX/UI Designer is to be the hands-on design resource focused on creating screen layouts, interaction design, and visual presentation of the applications. This may be a junior or senior role that spends a majority of their time sitting with the development teams to ensure the overall design systems are kept intact and reacting to new feature development with new interaction designs. Level of Involvement: The UX/UI Designer will likely be 100% focused on the Transformation for the duration of the project. Every development sprint should be iterating on the user interface and the designer should work side-by-side with the development team to design new features. This project may require multiple designers.', '• Experience designing voice applications, CRM, business apps, web apps and mobile solutions for enterprise platforms;', '• Strong communication and presentation skills;', '• Knowledge of Adobe Analytics reporting and implementation practices', 'Position Purpose', '• Experience in consulting and the ability to deal with ambiguity', '• High energy level, enthusiastic, and eager to do what is necessary to be successful;', '• Essential Skills –Cloud, UX Design, Material Design, HTML5, PDF Analysis and Remediation', '• Ability to think at a high level about Analytics strategy and vision;']

['', 'Translate findings from genetic studies into therapeutic hypotheses and contribute to decisions around therapeutic modality and targeting strategies', 'Responsibilities:', 'Applicants must have authorization to work in the U.S.', 'Survey the latest developments in the broader genetics community and incorporate relevant approaches for internal studies', 'Position Description:', 'Your responsibilities will include using human genetics data to identify new therapeutic targets in order to advance Empirico’s drug discovery and development pipeline. You will be expected to:', 'Communicate and report genetic findings and analyses with colleagues, collaborators, investors and through peer-reviewed publication', 'Demonstrated ability to design and interpret human genetics studies and to discern therapeutic hypotheses', 'Empirico, an early-stage biotechnology company, is looking for a scientist-level computational geneticist experienced in analyzing and interpreting large scale human genetics data for the purpose of therapeutic target discovery. This is an excellent opportunity for a highly-motivated, creative scientist to be a vital member of a team of experts dedicated to identifying new disease targets and translating those insights into therapeutic programs.', 'Familiarity with the design of functional studies to understand the mechanistic basis for genetic associations', 'Work with a multidisciplinary team consisting of human geneticists, biologists, bioinformaticians and software engineers to assist in the design, execution, and interpretation of in silico genetics studiesUtilize existing knowledge and develop expertise in the biology and pathophysiology of identified targets and relevant diseasesTranslate findings from genetic studies into therapeutic hypotheses and contribute to decisions around therapeutic modality and targeting strategiesCollaborate with biologists and chemists on the design of in vitro and in vivo experiments to validate therapeutic hypotheses that are motivated by human genetics findingsSurvey the latest developments in the broader genetics community and incorporate relevant approaches for internal studiesProvide novel ideas and critical thinking for the continued development and improvement of Empirico’s target discovery platformCommunicate and report genetic findings and analyses with colleagues, collaborators, investors and through peer-reviewed publication', 'To all agencies: Please do not contact any employee of Empirico about this position. All resumes submitted by agencies to any employee of Empirico via-email or in any form and by any method will be deemed the sole property of Empirico, unless such agencies were engaged by Empirico for this position and a valid agreement is in place.', 'Requirements:', 'This position requires an MD or PhD with 0-3 years of postgraduate experience in human genetics research with a translational focus. Recent graduates and postdocs encouraged to apply.Demonstrated ability to design and interpret human genetics studies and to discern therapeutic hypothesesA firm understanding of the principles of statistical genetics and genetic epidemiologyFamiliarity with the design of functional studies to understand the mechanistic basis for genetic associationsApplicants must have authorization to work in the U.S.', 'Utilize existing knowledge and develop expertise in the biology and pathophysiology of identified targets and relevant diseases', 'Empirico is a venture-backed, next-generation therapeutics company founded on utilizing huge biological datasets, human genetics and programmable biology to power novel target discovery and development. Empirico’s Precision Insights Platform was purpose-built for therapeutic discovery and leverages a world-leading dataset and advanced algorithmic approaches to identify and prioritize therapeutic targets with a high probability of translational success. High priority therapeutic targets are experimentally validated in-house prior to progressing through pre-clinical development with the most optimal therapeutic modality. Empirico is headquartered in San Diego, CA with laboratories in Madison, WI.', 'Work with a multidisciplinary team consisting of human geneticists, biologists, bioinformaticians and software engineers to assist in the design, execution, and interpretation of in silico genetics studies', 'Empirico is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'This position requires an MD or PhD with 0-3 years of postgraduate experience in human genetics research with a translational focus. Recent graduates and postdocs encouraged to apply.', 'A firm understanding of the principles of statistical genetics and genetic epidemiology', 'Collaborate with biologists and chemists on the design of in vitro and in vivo experiments to validate therapeutic hypotheses that are motivated by human genetics findings', 'Provide novel ideas and critical thinking for the continued development and improvement of Empirico’s target discovery platform']

['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'About Our Team', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. You are an executor too.', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. ', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

['', 'PHP or C#.', 'A degree in computer science or multiple years on the job where you wrote code for at least 50% of the time, with references.', '.NET / IIS Administration.', 'Other Web Development Skills.', 'A degree in computer science or multiple years on the job where you wrote code for at least 50% of the time, with references.AWS CertificationsExperience in financial services, with fundamental data, stock data, and the accompanying calculations and metrics.Talend Open Studio.WinAutomation.Apache web server administration.NodeJS & JavaScript coding abilities.Google Docs API experience.Stripe or PayPal API experience.Other AWS skills with CodeDeploy, FSX, EFS, Route53, Aurora DB, database migration tools, etc..NET / IIS Administration.SSL administration.Linux (Ubuntu) administration skills.Windows administration and PowerShell skills.Selenium Testing Framework.PHP or C#.WordPress administration abilities.Other Web Development Skills.', 'Several years of intensive AWS experience including EC2 management, auto-scaling, reserved instance tuning, cost optimization, CI/CD etc. (Working through the web console vs ec2 scripting tools is ok).Excellent Aurora and MySQL / MariaDB skills. You should know when to use which engines, the right way to set up indexing and primary keys, when foreign keys make sense and when they don t, how to quickly bulk load, move, transform, and migrate data. How to optimize large datasets for read speed vs write speed, etc.Strong Automation Skills. You should have a solid background in setting up automated data loads with alerting and fault tolerance. You need to be able to transform the data as part of the process, run calculations, update multiple data sources at once, etc. In other words, you should be an ETL pro.Ability to take responsibility to keep servers and processes running 24x7x365. When you take time off, things should be working perfectly and you should document everything for a smooth handoff. We do have a company to assist with 24x7 monitoring, but you will own the infrastructure and be responsible for making sure they are providing you the assistance you need, etc. Our apps and servers running smoothly will be on your shoulders. You should welcome the challenge.US/Canada/Western Europe based. Excellent English communication abilities with native or near native fluency in speaking and writing. We are delighted to have you come from anywhere in the world as long as your communication is excellent. We do need you to be living full time in US/Canada or western Europe.References for full time employment at a company that can be contacted by us. (We will need to talk to several people before hiring).', 'Strong Automation Skills. You should have a solid background in setting up automated data loads with alerting and fault tolerance. You need to be able to transform the data as part of the process, run calculations, update multiple data sources at once, etc. In other words, you should be an ETL pro.', 'Windows administration and PowerShell skills.', 'US/Canada/Western Europe based. Excellent English communication abilities with native or near native fluency in speaking and writing. We are delighted to have you come from anywhere in the world as long as your communication is excellent. We do need you to be living full time in US/Canada or western Europe.', 'Google Docs API experience.', 'Write an email to: jobs@cmlviz.com.The subject/title of the email should be Senior DevOps/DBA ApplicationAttach a resume in Word or PDF format with your experience, or link to a google doc.In the email give us: a quick summary of your experience, tell us where you live and reside, what your required salary is, and if you have any time or schedule constraints.', 'Excellent Aurora and MySQL / MariaDB skills. You should know when to use which engines, the right way to set up indexing and primary keys, when foreign keys make sense and when they don t, how to quickly bulk load, move, transform, and migrate data. How to optimize large datasets for read speed vs write speed, etc.', 'We’ve bootstrapped ourselves into a profitable business. We’ve done it by keeping our team ultralight and by each person taking on dozens of responsibilities and kicking @$$ at all of them. We need a new wingman.', 'References for full time employment at a company that can be contacted by us. (We will need to talk to several people before hiring).', 'Attach a resume in Word or PDF format with your experience, or link to a google doc.', 'Apache web server administration.', 'The subject/title of the email should be Senior DevOps/DBA Application', 'NodeJS & JavaScript coding abilities.', 'Linux (Ubuntu) administration skills.', 'Strongly Desired, i.e. Unlikely to Hire without a few of the following, in approximate order of importance:', 'WinAutomation.', 'AWS Certifications', 'Write an email to: jobs@cmlviz.com.', 'Experience in financial services, with fundamental data, stock data, and the accompanying calculations and metrics.', 'Ability to take responsibility to keep servers and processes running 24x7x365. When you take time off, things should be working perfectly and you should document everything for a smooth handoff. We do have a company to assist with 24x7 monitoring, but you will own the infrastructure and be responsible for making sure they are providing you the assistance you need, etc. Our apps and servers running smoothly will be on your shoulders. You should welcome the challenge.', 'WordPress administration abilities.', 'Talend Open Studio.', 'Stripe or PayPal API experience.', 'To apply', 'Fast-growing, profitable startup needs an AWS, MySQL, and Automation rockstar to keep our company’s engine running at peak performance.', 'Must Haves for You:', 'In the email give us: a quick summary of your experience, tell us where you live and reside, what your required salary is, and if you have any time or schedule constraints.', 'SSL administration.', 'To apply , follow the following steps. These are intentionally a little OCD because we want to filter out people spamming resumes. If you actually do these steps, you will be in the 1% of resumes we consider, thanks.', 'Several years of intensive AWS experience including EC2 management, auto-scaling, reserved instance tuning, cost optimization, CI/CD etc. (Working through the web console vs ec2 scripting tools is ok).', 'Selenium Testing Framework.', 'Other AWS skills with CodeDeploy, FSX, EFS, Route53, Aurora DB, database migration tools, etc.', 'We are going to assess all of your skills in a live demo, so please be 100% honest about what you know and what you’d need to learn.', 'We are a remote / distributed company, and this job is intended as a remote position. The person working this position should be Working from Denver or Las Vegas with another team member is a possibility if you happen to live nearby.', 'We are an ultralight, financial services company with several products and thousands of delighted, paying customers. The demands on us are changing all the time, and we need someone who can quickly learn and evolve as our company does. You should love to work hard and learn new skills.', '\xa0']

job_title: Field Application Scientist, Genedata Selector, USA-Boston
job_text: ['', 'Internet-based and on-site product training sessions with customers', 'Communicate customer needs and coordinate activities internally with the scientific consulting and professional services team, business account managers and product managers', 'Scientific consulting and professional service activities for customer projects, working with customer’s cross functional partners including scientific and IT partnersIdentify customer needs, and map them to the capabilities of the softwareTroubleshoot scientific and technical support issues and capture user feedbackCommunicate customer needs and coordinate activities internally with the scientific consulting and professional services team, business account managers and product managersSupport our sales team with product expertise, scientific presentations, and software demonstrationsPresent the product vision of Genedata Selector to prospects and customersInternet-based and on-site product training sessions with customersIdentify new business opportunities with business account managersDefine appropriate service projects with customers to fulfill unmet needs', 'Our collective expertise in research informatics, combined with our open and scalable computational solutions, makes us the leading software provider in discovery informatics for biotech, pharmaceuticals, and related life sciences.', 'Troubleshoot scientific and technical support issues and capture user feedback', 'Present the product vision of Genedata Selector to prospects and customers', 'Identify customer needs, and map them to the capabilities of the software', 'Your accountabilities:', 'Must be currently located in the United States', 'Scientific consulting and professional service activities for customer projects, working with customer’s cross functional partners including scientific and IT partners', 'The successful candidate has:', 'What can you expect from us?', 'Support our sales team with product expertise, scientific presentations, and software demonstrations', 'Genedata’s success in providing computational solutions for bio-pharmaceutical R&D depends on its people from all over the world: innovative data scientists, talented soft-ware engineers, strategic marketing thinkers, communicative business developers plus any others with unique skills that make a difference in a highly innovative environment.', 'Identify new business opportunities with business account managers', 'MS or PhD in biology, microbiology, bioinformatics, or similar discipline', 'Familiar with SQL and relational databases (e.g. Oracle) is a plus', 'MS or PhD in biology, microbiology, bioinformatics, or similar discipline3 years’ experience working in a biopharma, industrial biotech, agribusiness or related life sciences environment using standard bioinformatics tools and databasesExperience in analyzing next generation sequencing data (RNA-seq, DNA-seq, metagenomics, etc.)Knowledgeable about applications and tools commonly used for next generation sequencing analysisRelated statistical analysis experienceProficient working in a UNIX environment and with using a scripting or programming language (e.g. Perl, Python, Java)Familiar with SQL and relational databases (e.g. Oracle) is a plusExcellent written and verbal communication skillsFluency in English is a mustHighly motivated self-starterMust be currently located in the United StatesLegal authorization to work in the United States on a full-time basis for any employer is required', 'Experience in analyzing next generation sequencing data (RNA-seq, DNA-seq, metagenomics, etc.)', 'As a Field Application Scientist for the Genedata Selector platform, you will work with our scientific team to support customer projects, answer technical questions, and find creative approaches to genomic-scale problems.\xa0You will work in a variety of diverse application areas including comparative genomics, metagenomics, biosafety, short read sequence, and statistical analysis of quantitative data.\xa0You will also act as an interface between science and sales, working closely with external customers and internal sales and software engineering teams.', 'Genedata offers an attractive Total Reward Package that comprises a competitive salary and attractive benefits in return for your contribution to our success.', 'What is next?', 'Knowledgeable about applications and tools commonly used for next generation sequencing analysis', 'Fluency in English is a must', 'Define appropriate service projects with customers to fulfill unmet needs', 'Genedata only accepts CVs and resumes directly from candidates. Personnel recruitment agencies need not respond.', 'Proficient working in a UNIX environment and with using a scripting or programming language (e.g. Perl, Python, Java)', 'Highly motivated self-starter', 'Related statistical analysis experience', '3 years’ experience working in a biopharma, industrial biotech, agribusiness or related life sciences environment using standard bioinformatics tools and databases', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', 'Legal authorization to work in the United States on a full-time basis for any employer is required', 'If you are interested in this position, please submit us your CV and motivation letter.', 'The Position', 'Are you a scientist or computational biologist with an interest in analyzing and interpreting ‘omics datasets and genome/proteome sequences?\xa0Does the idea of working in partnership with the world’s leading agribusiness, industrial biotechnology, and pharmaceutical companies to solve big data challenges sound exciting to you? \xa0If so, we would like to talk with you as we seek to grow our interdisciplinary scientific consulting and application support team in our East Coast Office.', '\xa0', 'Genedata is an Equal Opportunity Employer.', 'If you would like the next step in your career to be supporting the frontier of science and technology with cutting-edge software, Genedata has just the right opportunity for you!']

job_title: Software Engineer in Big Data Infra
job_text: ['', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Build services to support Multi-tenant environment with 100+ PBs in Datasets. ', ' As an engineer you will be building services that can help operate and scale the infrastructure ', ' Experience with big data technologies like Spark ', ' Experience with big data technologies like Spark  Experience with GCP Big data services  Experience with DevOps methodologies and tools for automating and monitoring ', ' NOTE: If your name is hyphenated or has multiple capitalization, please use the same format as your government ID. ', 'Reference Number: ', ' A successful candidate will be a strong engineer who can be part of a high performance engineering team, with excellent communication skills, and an ability to deliver results in a fast paced environment. ', ' Job requirements ', ' What you will work on ', 'Job Description Summary', ' Excellent team player and great attitude. Willingness to understand and work through global software development approaches and inherent problems it surfaces ', ' Please Capitalize first letter of your First and Last Name. ', ' Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies. ', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Travel Percent', ' Knowledge and experience with cloud technologies ', ' Take responsibility for services you build ', ' Provide full legal First Name/Family Name – this is important for us to ensure our future hires have the right system set up. ', ' Experience with design and development of scalable services and platforms ', 'Who We Are', " We're a purpose-driven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom. ", ' Experience with DevOps methodologies and tools for automating and monitoring ', ' Work directly with Lead engineer, Architecture, Product Managers, Program Managers and stakeholders ', ' Analyze platform behavior to optimize resource usage and cost ', ' As an engineer you will be building services that can help operate and scale the infrastructure  Take responsibility for services you build  Work directly with Lead engineer, Architecture, Product Managers, Program Managers and stakeholders  Work directly with Product Managers, Program Managers, Data Scientists/Customers  Mentor engineers locally and globally  Analyze platform behavior to optimize resource usage and cost  Build services to support Multi-tenant environment with 100+ PBs in Datasets. ', ' Mentor engineers locally and globally ', 'Requirements', ' Please avoid using fully capitalized text for your First and/or Last Name. ', ' Work directly with Product Managers, Program Managers, Data Scientists/Customers ', 'Job Description', ' Provide full legal First Name/Family Name – this is important for us to ensure our future hires have the right system set up.  Please Capitalize first letter of your First and Last Name.  Please avoid using fully capitalized text for your First and/or Last Name.  NOTE: If your name is hyphenated or has multiple capitalization, please use the same format as your government ID. ', 'Subsidiary', ' Experience with GCP Big data services ', ' A successful candidate will be a strong engineer who can be part of a high performance engineering team, with excellent communication skills, and an ability to deliver results in a fast paced environment.  Excellent team player and great attitude. Willingness to understand and work through global software development approaches and inherent problems it surfaces  Experience with design and development of scalable services and platforms  3+ years’ experience in one or more of the following language: Golang (big plus), Java, C++, NodeJS, python and scripting.  Knowledge and experience with cloud technologies ', ' 3+ years’ experience in one or more of the following language: Golang (big plus), Java, C++, NodeJS, python and scripting. ']

job_title: Postdoctoral Research Scientist in Proteomics and Mass Spectrometry
company: Columbia University in the City of New York
job_text: ['', 'Columbia University is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer', 'The successful applicant will join our active research group and have the opportunity to initiate their own research project employing mass spectrometry based proteomics in any one of a variety of scientific areas including those described above, and be first author of any publications arising out of such a project.', 'Job Requirements', 'The successful candidate should have a Ph.D. in a relevant field, and experience with mass spectrometry-based proteomics. Interested candidates should submit a cover letter, c.v., and contact information for three professional references. Please apply by email/upload.', 'The position will also include opportunities to co-author publications with leading collaborators and to contribute to the development of grant proposals.', "A postdoctoral opportunity is available immediately at Columbia University in New York City. We use mass spectrometry to collaborate with some of the premier research groups at Columbia and at peer institutions in New York. Candidates with significant experience in biological mass spectrometry are invited to apply. We have continuing long-term funding to study basic science as well as clinically-oriented projects in areas such as a large proteomics study of cerebrospinal fluid in familial and sporadic Alzheimer's disease patients. In other projects, emphasis is on large-scale quantitative protein profiling as well as the study of posttranslational modifications, particularly phosphorylation leading to the understanding of novel cell death mechanisms in cancer cells. Other diverse collaborations deal with diet and bariatric surgery, and liquid phase transitions as organizers of chromatin structure. In our collaborative laboratory (http://proteomics.bio.columbia.edu) we participate in intensive, long-term and large-scale collaborations with leading research groups. Our role includes project planning, experimental design, sample processing, peptide enrichments, LC/MS, computational and pathway analysis, data interpretation and authorship of publications. We emphasize bottom-up proteomics with a Q Exactive HF Orbitrap from Thermo Scientific. A Synapt G2 QTOF with ion mobility from Waters Corp. is also available in the lab to support a variety of projects including in lipidomics and metabolomics. Participation in those projects are also possible as cross-training opportunities.", 'The position provides opportunities to work closely with graduate students, postdoctoral scientists and faculty for other research groups. Professional development is strongly encouraged with support for professional travel to conferences.', 'The laboratory, directed by Lewis M. Brown, Ph.D., is located on the main campus of Columbia University, a quiet oasis in New York City. The university maintains an excellent Covid-19 protection program and New York leads the nation in public health infection control. An excellent subsidized university-owned and managed postdoc apartment (for individual or family), conveniently located a short walk from the lab may be provided if desired. Competitive salary and benefits are provided and a postdoctoral workers union helps to improve working conditions for postdocs at Columbia.', '\xa0']

job_title: 2020 Intern Conversion: 2021 Full Time Data Scientist - GEC
job_text: [" What you'll do...A Data Scientist is responsible for analyzing large data sets to develop custom models and algorithms to drive business solutions. Data Scientists work on project teams in order to provide analytical support to projects (for example, email targeting, business optimization, consumer recommendations) for Walmart eCommerce. Data Scientists are responsible for building large data sets from multiple sources in order to build algorithms for predicting future data characteristics. Those algorithms will be tested, validated, and applied to large data sets. Data Scientists are responsible for training the algorithms so they can be applied to future data sets and provide the appropriate search results. Data Scientists are responsible for researching new trends in the industry and utilizing up-to-date technology (for example, HBase, MapReduce, LAPack, Gurobi) and analytical skills to support their assigned project.Develop custom data models to drive innovative business solutions.Work with cross-functional partners across the businessBuild complex data sets from multiple data sources, both internally and externally.Conduct advanced statistical analysis to determine trends and significant data relationships.Build learning systems to analyze and filter continuous data flows and offline data analysis.Train algorithms to apply models to new data sets.Validate models and algorithmic techniques.Scale new algorithms to large data sets.Combine data features to determine search models.Research new techniques and best practices within the industry.Develop models of current state in order to determine needed improvements.Utilize system tools including (MySQL, Hadoop, Weka, R, Matlab,ILog). Demonstrates up-to-date expertise and applies this to the development, execution, and improvement of action plans by providing expert advice and guidance to others in the application of information and best practices; supporting and aligning efforts to meet customer and business needs; and building commitment for perspectives and rationales. Provides and supports the implementation of business solutions by building relationships and partnerships with key stakeholders; identifying business needs; determining and carrying out necessary processes and practices; monitoring progress and results; recognizing and capitalizing on improvement opportunities; and adapting to competing demands, organizational changes, and new responsibilities. Models compliance with company policies and procedures and supports company mission, values, and standards of ethics and integrity by incorporating these into the development and implementation of business plans; using the Open Door Policy; and demonstrating and assisting others with how to apply these in executing business processes and practices.  Minimum Qualifications... Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications.  Minimum Qualifications: Bachelor of Science and 5 years' data science experience OR Master of Science and 2 years' data science experience.  Preferred Qualifications...  Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications.", ' Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. job_title: Machine Learning Sr. Data Scientist (Python, DNN, AWS)
job_text: ['', 'We can offer our Machine Learning Senior Data Scientist:', 'The freedom to explore unconventional ideas as we harness and achieve scientific breakthroughsA culture rooted in diversity that offers our employees the opportunity to work with some of the best scientists, engineers, and coders from around the globeThe ability to work with a highly intellectual teamExpansive benefits (unlimited PTO, etc.), competitive salaries, and share options', 'The ability to work with a highly intellectual team', 'Expansive benefits (unlimited PTO, etc.), competitive salaries, and share options', 'The freedom to explore unconventional ideas as we harness and achieve scientific breakthroughs', 'Machine Learning Senior Data Scientist (Python, DNN, AWS)', 'A culture rooted in diversity that offers our employees the opportunity to work with some of the best scientists, engineers, and coders from around the globe', 'We would like from our Machine Learning Senior Data Scientist the ability to implement a mixture of research, innovation, and production with an emphasis on end to end data science. This is an interesting opportunity to use new machine learning techniques and test them at scale from the data gathering stage all the way to deployment with the\xa0use of deep learning approaches such as CNN, RNN and Reinforcement learning.\xa0NLP experience is a bonus as the ability to analyze various datasets and build new products is key.\xa0', 'Key Skills: Machine Learning, Data Science, Data Scientist, Deep Learning, RNN, DNN, Reinforcement Learning, NLP, BERT, Elmo, Glove, Artificial Intelligence,\xa0AWS EC2, S3, AWS SageMaker, Python, or Java, AWS', 'We are currently seeking a\xa0Machine Learning Senior Data Scientist\xa0to join our tech company in its pursuit to tackle some of the most challenging issues in healthcare administration by creating a platform by using the most innovative machine learning and deep learning\xa0using latest advances in Deep Learning (CNNs, RNNs, Reinforcement Learning) and NLP (Bert, Elmo, Glove) to build a first-of-its kind AI platform using huge exclusive datasets from a US leading healthcare provider', 'Located in the Boston area, we are keen on bringing in some of the brightest and most talented engineers, researchers, and scientists to help us develop scientific methods that will innovate the medical field. As the\xa0Machine Learning Senior Data Scientist\xa0in our company you will work alongside other members of our AI team to invent and implement machine learning techniques that will alleviate administrative error and delay in our healthcare system.\xa0', '\xa0', 'We can offer our Machine Learning Senior Data Scientist', 'Key Skills: Machine Learning, Data Science, Data Scientist, Deep Learning, RNN, DNN, Reinforcement Learning, NLP, BERT, Elmo, Glove, Artificial Intelligence,\xa0']

['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'About Our Team', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

Willingness to understand and work through global software development approaches and inherent problems it surfaces ', ' Please Capitalize first letter of your First and Last Name. ', ' Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies. ', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Travel Percent', ' Knowledge and experience with cloud technologies ', ' Take responsibility for services you build ', ' Provide full legal First Name/Family Name – this is important for us to ensure our future hires have the right system set up. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom. ['', 'Work with a multidisciplinary team consisting of human geneticists, biologists, bioinformaticians and software engineers to lead the design, execution, and interpretation of in silico genetics studiesUtilize existing knowledge and develop expertise in the biology and pathophysiology of identified targets and relevant diseasesTranslate findings from genetic studies into therapeutic hypotheses and contribute to decisions around therapeutic modality and targeting strategiesCollaborate with biologists and chemists on the design of in vitro and in vivo experiments to validate therapeutic hypotheses that are motivated by human genetics findingsSurvey the latest developments in the broader genetics community and incorporate relevant approaches for internal studiesProvide novel ideas and critical thinking for the continued development and improvement of Empirico’s target discovery platformCommunicate and report genetic findings and analyses with colleagues, collaborators, investors and through peer-reviewed publication', 'Translate findings from genetic studies into therapeutic hypotheses and contribute to decisions around therapeutic modality and targeting strategies', 'Responsibilities:', 'Applicants must have authorization to work in the U.S.', 'Survey the latest developments in the broader genetics community and incorporate relevant approaches for internal studies', 'Work with a multidisciplinary team consisting of human geneticists, biologists, bioinformaticians and software engineers to lead the design, execution, and interpretation of in silico genetics studies', 'Position Description:', 'Your responsibilities will include using human genetics data to identify new therapeutic targets in order to advance Empirico’s drug discovery and development pipeline. You will be expected to:', 'Communicate and report genetic findings and analyses with colleagues, collaborators, investors and through peer-reviewed publication', 'Familiarity with the design of functional studies to understand the mechanistic basis for genetic associations', 'Empirico, an early-stage biotechnology company, is looking for a computational geneticist experienced in analyzing and interpreting large scale human genetics data for the purpose of therapeutic target discovery. This is an excellent opportunity for a highly-motivated, creative scientist to be a vital member of a team of experts dedicated to identifying new disease targets and translating those insights into therapeutic programs.', 'Requirements:', 'Utilize existing knowledge and develop expertise in the biology and pathophysiology of identified targets and relevant diseases', 'This position requires an MD or PhD with at least 3 years of experience in human genetics research with a translational focus', 'Empirico is a venture-backed, next-generation therapeutics company founded on utilizing huge biological datasets, human genetics and programmable biology to power novel target discovery and development. Empirico’s Precision Insights Platform was purpose-built for therapeutic discovery and leverages a world-leading dataset and advanced algorithmic approaches to identify and prioritize therapeutic targets with a high probability of translational success. High priority therapeutic targets are experimentally validated in-house prior to progressing through pre-clinical development with the most optimal therapeutic modality. Empirico is headquartered in San Diego, CA with laboratories in Madison, WI.', 'A firm understanding of the principles of statistical genetics and genetic epidemiology', 'This position requires an MD or PhD with at least 3 years of experience in human genetics research with a translational focusDemonstrated ability to design, lead and interpret human genetics studies and to discern therapeutic hypothesesA firm understanding of the principles of statistical genetics and genetic epidemiologyFamiliarity with the design of functional studies to understand the mechanistic basis for genetic associationsApplicants must have authorization to work in the U.S.', 'Collaborate with biologists and chemists on the design of in vitro and in vivo experiments to validate therapeutic hypotheses that are motivated by human genetics findings', 'Provide novel ideas and critical thinking for the continued development and improvement of Empirico’s target discovery platform', 'Demonstrated ability to design, lead and interpret human genetics studies and to discern therapeutic hypotheses']

['', 'Application Process', ' Analyze scientific data: develop and maintain database; interpret results utilizing statistical or computer analysis; ensure data is entered accurately; report summary of results to PI.', ' Excellent problem-solving skills', ' Research experience with real-time PCR and traditional PCR techniques helpful', 'Additional Requirements', 'Duties And Responsibilities', ' Good written and communication skills', ' Work in coordination with team members to design and execute experimental protocols; assist in directing projects by contributing intellectually to design and direction of research; meet with team members to discuss experiment design; determine procedures and techniques needed to accomplish experimental goals; implement plan, including determination of reagents needed and their preparation; synthesize experiments and results into presentations As a UW employee, you will enjoy generous benefits and work/life programs.  REQUIREMENTS:  ', ' Knowledge of scientific discipline and applicable techniques and procedures used in a research lab setting', ' Knowledge of patient safety according to the assigned department', ' Good organization skills, including attention to detail', ' Research experience with sterile tissue culture techniques helpful.', ' Research experience with ELISAs, neutralizing antibody assays helpful.', ' Virology or immunology research experience desired.', ' Research experience with isolating PBMCs and processing blood desired.', ' CONDITIONS OF EMPLOYMENT ', ' Assist in general maintenance of the laboratory and lab systems: prepare solutions, buffers, and reagents; clean glassware as needed; order/maintain supplies for day-to-day operation of the lab; assist in maintenance/repair of laboratory equipment.', " Master's or PhD level education in biology, microbiology, biochemistry, immunology, molecular biology or related field desired.At Least 3 Year's Experience In", ' As a UW employee, you will enjoy generous benefits and work/life programs. ', ' Able to read English and follow both verbal and written instructionsEquivalent education/experience will substitute for all minimum qualifications except when there are legal requirements, such as a license/certification/registration. DESIRED ', ' Perform laboratory procedures and investigative work as part of ongoing research projects. Perform a variety of moderately complex investigative/technical procedures; interpret results and determine whether they are consistent with experimental goals; modify experimental procedures or technique to obtain optimal experimental results; assist in the assembly, organization and interpretation of data. Assist in the planning, execution and analysis of research experiments.', ' Knowledge of software applications, proficiency using MS Office (Outlook, Word, Excel & Access), and ability to learn new software programs', ' Perform tissue culture procedures and biochemical assays: cell line maintenance, virus growth and harvest, ELISAs, neutralizing antibody assays. Process human blood samples including isolating PBMCs.', ' REQUIREMENTS: ', " Master's degree in biology, microbiology, biochemistry, immunologic, molecular biology or a related field. Equivalent experience can substitute for degree requirement.Additional Requirements", ' Data collection, analysis and summary skills', ' Good laboratory techniques and record keeping skills', ' The Chu Lab is searching for a new Research Scientist/Engineer 2 in the field of virology and immunology', ' Knowledge of DNA analysis software and related computer techniques', ' Research experience with use of sequencing analysis software helpful. CONDITIONS OF EMPLOYMENT Application ProcessThe application process for UW positions may include completion of a variety of online assessments to obtain additional information that will be used in the evaluation process. These assessments may include Workforce Authorization, Cover Letter and/or others. Any assessments that you need to complete will appear on your screen as soon as you select “Apply to this position”. Once you begin an assessment, it must be completed at that time; if you do not complete the assessment you will be prompted to do so the next time you access your “My Jobs” page. If you select to take it later, it will appear on your "My Jobs" page to take when you are ready.  Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed.', ' Strong interpersonal skills', ' Perform standard molecular biology procedures and assays: isolate genomic DNA and RNA from samples; isolate bacterial chromosomal and plasmid DNA; perform general biochemical assays, including gel electrophoresis; prepare solutions for experiments; obtain accurate results and carry out experiments in a timely manner; identify methodological problems in research protocol and implement modifications to optimize experimental results, as authorized by the PI; learn new techniques with supervision.', "At Least 3 Year's Experience In", ' Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed.', ' Perform laboratory procedures and investigative work as part of ongoing research projects. Perform a variety of moderately complex investigative/technical procedures; interpret results and determine whether they are consistent with experimental goals; modify experimental procedures or technique to obtain optimal experimental results; assist in the assembly, organization and interpretation of data. Assist in the planning, execution and analysis of research experiments.  Perform standard molecular biology procedures and assays: isolate genomic DNA and RNA from samples; isolate bacterial chromosomal and plasmid DNA; perform general biochemical assays, including gel electrophoresis; prepare solutions for experiments; obtain accurate results and carry out experiments in a timely manner; identify methodological problems in research protocol and implement modifications to optimize experimental results, as authorized by the PI; learn new techniques with supervision.  Perform tissue culture procedures and biochemical assays: cell line maintenance, virus growth and harvest, ELISAs, neutralizing antibody assays. Process human blood samples including isolating PBMCs.  Analyze scientific data: develop and maintain database; interpret results utilizing statistical or computer analysis; ensure data is entered accurately; report summary of results to PI.  Assist in general maintenance of the laboratory and lab systems: prepare solutions, buffers, and reagents; clean glassware as needed; order/maintain supplies for day-to-day operation of the lab; assist in maintenance/repair of laboratory equipment.  Work in coordination with team members to design and execute experimental protocols; assist in directing projects by contributing intellectually to design and direction of research; meet with team members to discuss experiment design; determine procedures and techniques needed to accomplish experimental goals; implement plan, including determination of reagents needed and their preparation; synthesize experiments and results into presentations As a UW employee, you will enjoy generous benefits and work/life programs.  REQUIREMENTS:    Master\'s degree in biology, microbiology, biochemistry, immunologic, molecular biology or a related field. Equivalent experience can substitute for degree requirement.Additional Requirements  Knowledge of scientific discipline and applicable techniques and procedures used in a research lab setting  Knowledge of patient safety according to the assigned department  Knowledge of basic principles of media preparation and sterile techniques  Knowledge of software applications, proficiency using MS Office (Outlook, Word, Excel & Access), and ability to learn new software programs  Knowledge of DNA analysis software and related computer techniques  Excellent problem-solving skills  Strong interpersonal skills  Good laboratory techniques and record keeping skills  Good organization skills, including attention to detail  Data collection, analysis and summary skills  Good written and communication skills  Able to read English and follow both verbal and written instructionsEquivalent education/experience will substitute for all minimum qualifications except when there are legal requirements, such as a license/certification/registration. DESIRED   Master\'s or PhD level education in biology, microbiology, biochemistry, immunology, molecular biology or related field desired.At Least 3 Year\'s Experience In  Virology or immunology research experience desired.  Research experience with isolating PBMCs and processing blood desired.  Research experience with sterile tissue culture techniques helpful.  Research experience with ELISAs, neutralizing antibody assays helpful.  Research experience with real-time PCR and traditional PCR techniques helpful  Research experience with use of sequencing analysis software helpful. CONDITIONS OF EMPLOYMENT Application ProcessThe application process for UW positions may include completion of a variety of online assessments to obtain additional information that will be used in the evaluation process. These assessments may include Workforce Authorization, Cover Letter and/or others. Any assessments that you need to complete will appear on your screen as soon as you select “Apply to this position”. Once you begin an assessment, it must be completed at that time; if you do not complete the assessment you will be prompted to do so the next time you access your “My Jobs” page. If you select to take it later, it will appear on your "My Jobs" page to take when you are ready.  Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed.', ' DESIRED', ' Knowledge of basic principles of media preparation and sterile techniques']

job_title: Sr. Machine Learning Engineer (Python, Java, C++)
job_text: ['', 'Sr. Machine Learning Engineer (Python, Java, C++)', 'The ability to work with a highly intellectual team', 'The freedom to explore unconventional ideas as we harness and achieve scientific breakthroughsA culture rooted in diversity that offers our employees the opportunity to work with some of the best scientists, engineers, and coders from around the globeThe ability to work with a highly intellectual teamExpansive benefits, competitive salaries, and share options', 'Expansive benefits, competitive salaries, and share options', 'Located in San Mateo Valley, we are keen on bringing in some of the brightest and most talented engineers, researchers, and scientists to help us revolutionize the personalization of web experiences by replacing the traditional approaches to optimization and by revamping websites for revenue-driven leaders with novel machine learning algorithms. As a Sr. Machine Learning Engineer, you will work closely alongside a team of optimization and machine learning experts from top tech backgrounds (Google, Yahoo, Twitter) to develop a first-of-its-kind AI software that dynamically personalizes customer experience at an unparalleled scale through their proprietary, cutting-edge ML systems.', 'The freedom to explore unconventional ideas as we harness and achieve scientific breakthroughs', 'We can offer our Senior Machine Learning Engineer: ', 'A culture rooted in diversity that offers our employees the opportunity to work with some of the best scientists, engineers, and coders from around the globe', 'Key Skills: Machine Learning Engineer, Machine Learning, Software Development, Software Engineering, Backend Development, C++, Java, Python, Scripting, AI, Machine Learning, OOP, Object-Oriented Programming, Microservices, REST API, Data Engineering, System Architecture, Spark, Airflow, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Data Pipeline, Machine Learning Pipeline, Infrastructure', "I wanted to reach out to you as I'm currently seeking a Sr. Machine Learning Engineer (Python, Java, C++) to join a well-funded (recently receiving over $10 million) Bay Area startup (remote working encouraged) who are revolutionizing the way customers interact with company websites using predictive personalization - 25x faster than A/B testing.\xa0", '\xa0', "Essentially, what we're looking for is a strong Machine Learning Engineer that is excited to work in a start-up environment contributing hands-on experience to the implementation of novel machine learning algorithms."]
