['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'About Our Team', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

Databricks', 'Experience implementing data solutions in public cloud technologies including configuration and deployment', 'Experience influencing engineering best practices within your team, including design/code reviews, coding standards, source control management, build processes, and testing', 'Experience with CRM or CDP platforms like Salesforce Marketing Cloud', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or comparable experience 6+ years experience in Python, Scala, Java, or similar data processing programming language 3+ years experience with Spark, Hadoop, or Databricks collaboratively across multiple teams and customers to accomplish deliverables Experience with data analysis, processing, and validation Experience with SQL, databases, and data pipelining technologies and ETL frameworks Experience implementing data solutions in public cloud technologies including configuration and deployment Experiencing as a leader in making technical decisions (for example: served as Technical Lead across multiple teams) Strong communication and collaboration skills ', 'Create and implement scalable data models & schemas that power use cases such as predictive data models, advanced reporting and insights, and supporting our customer needs in user acquisition, WWP publishing, & game marketing teams. You will help identify important questions and then provide services, datasets, and tools that empower them to find the answers', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", ' Data Engineer III on the WWP Technology team', 'Owner for technical strategy, architecture, and implementation of the WWP MarTech platform', ' Owner for technical strategy, architecture, and implementation of the WWP MarTech platform Design and build tools that provide confidence in our data quality. You will create and oversee mature development processes and systems (i.e. automated tests, staged deployments) to validate our data is always flowing and correctly Create and implement scalable data models & schemas that power use cases such as predictive data models, advanced reporting and insights, and supporting our customer needs in user acquisition, WWP publishing, & game marketing teams. You will help identify important questions and then provide services, datasets, and tools that empower them to find the answers Help developers select data technologies that provide efficient insights with a high return on investment Provide technical leadership and mentor data & software engineers on the WWP Tech team ', 'Strong communication and collaboration skills', 'Experience working collaboratively across multiple teams and customers to accomplish deliverables', 'Our Perks', ' Experience working with analytics tools such as Google Analytics and Singular MMP Experience working with digital media and cross-device data from major networks like Facebook and Google Ads Experience with CRM or CDP platforms like Salesforce Marketing Cloud Experience with Google Cloud data ecosystem including BigQuery, Dataflow, Cloudrun, and BigTable ', 'Experience working with analytics tools such as Google Analytics and Singular MMP', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Experience working with digital media and cross-device data from major networks like Facebook and Google Ads', 'Required Qualifications', 'Help developers select data technologies that provide efficient insights with a high return on investment', 'Design and build tools that provide confidence in our data quality. job_title: Software Engineer in Big Data Infra
job_text: ['', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Build services to support Multi-tenant environment with 100+ PBs in Datasets. ', ' As an engineer you will be building services that can help operate and scale the infrastructure ', ' Experience with big data technologies like Spark ', ' Experience with big data technologies like Spark  Experience with GCP Big data services  Experience with DevOps methodologies and tools for automating and monitoring ', ' NOTE: If your name is hyphenated or has multiple capitalization, please use the same format as your government ID. ', 'Reference Number: ', ' A successful candidate will be a strong engineer who can be part of a high performance engineering team, with excellent communication skills, and an ability to deliver results in a fast paced environment. ', ' Job requirements ', ' What you will work on ', 'Job Description Summary', ' Excellent team player and great attitude. Willingness to understand and work through global software development approaches and inherent problems it surfaces ', ' Please Capitalize first letter of your First and Last Name. ', ' Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies. ', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Travel Percent', ' Knowledge and experience with cloud technologies ', ' Take responsibility for services you build ', ' Provide full legal First Name/Family Name – this is important for us to ensure our future hires have the right system set up. ', ' Experience with design and development of scalable services and platforms ', 'Who We Are', " We're a purpose-driven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom. ['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'About Our Team', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

['', 'Good organizational and communication skills.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Ph.D. degree in molecular genetics or biology, or equivalent research experience.Experience with mammalian cell cultures and DNA/RNA transfection/transformation.Good knowledge of mitochondrial genetics.Strong work ethic and ability to work in a team-based environment.Good organizational and communication skills.', 'Managing experimental planning and execution in a timely manner.', 'Strong work ethic and ability to work in a team-based environment.', 'Good knowledge of mitochondrial genetics.', 'Period of Employment: One year (possibility of extension)', 'NAPIGEN is a biotech company located in Wilmington, DE.\xa0Currently, we are seeking a postdoctoral scientist to be part of our R&D team to investigate mitochondrial genome editing of human cells.\xa0The successful candidate will apply the use of NAPIGEN’s proprietary gene editing technology to human cells.\xa0The tasks of the scientist will include but are not limited to the delivery of DNA/RNA molecules into human cells and the evaluation of gene editing by molecular assays.\xa0The work will be carried out in an independent manner; however, the ability for team work is also critical.\xa0Occasional weekend and off-hour work may be required.\xa0', 'Maintaining laboratory and experimental materials including human cell cultures in good functional conditions.', 'Period of Employment:', "NAPIGEN is a biotech company that aims to harness the power of mitochondria by use of its unique genome editing tools.\xa0NAPIGEN's proprietary technology provides business opportunities in human healthcare, industrial biotechnology and agriculture.\xa0The company's first business target is to address the food security needs of our society in view of the dramatic population increase expected this century.\xa0In addition, we explore the use of our gene editing technology for the cure and treatment of severe human diseases caused by mutations in mitochondrial DNA.\xa0NAPIGEN team members have extensive experience in biotech R&D and business management gained at multinational science companies such as DuPont and Monsanto.", 'Starting Date: ', 'Performing reliable research activities in an independent manner.Producing solid, reproducible scientific data.Managing experimental planning and execution in a timely manner.Maintaining laboratory and experimental materials including human cell cultures in good functional conditions.Discussing with team members ongoing research and lab management.', 'Ph.D. degree in molecular genetics or biology, or equivalent research experience.', 'Experience with mammalian cell cultures and DNA/RNA transfection/transformation.', 'Qualifications:', 'Producing solid, reproducible scientific data.', 'Discussing with team members ongoing research and lab management.', 'Performing reliable research activities in an independent manner.', 'About NAPIGEN', 'Starting Date: October 1, 2020 (negotiable)']

job_title: Senior Machine Learning Data Engineer | Series B ($38m) AI Intelligence Startup
job_text: ['', 'Intimate experience with data warehousing design (BigQuery, Cassandra, etc.)', 'Intimate experience with ETL pipelines (Dataflow, Spark, Beam, Airflow, etc.)', "Based in San Francisco, my client has raised $38m ($25m during COVID-19) to scale its end-to-end platform that creates training data for AI and ML (via data labeling) - They have already begun to help some of the world's largest tech companies make better sense of their data.", 'Senior ML Engineer ', 'Excellent developer with experience building production-scale data pipelines', 'Clear history of delivering on data warehousing solutions', 'Contribute to a team culture obsessed with MLOps', 'Design and optimize ETL pipelines + ML experimentation tooling', 'Nice to Have:', '**This position is open for SF, remote USA, and remote Canada**', 'Bachelors or Masters in CS preferred or equivalent experience', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0• Strong early-stage equity & remote flexibility', 'Deliver on large scale features that impact customers using data-hungry ML in production', 'Intimate experience with MLOps principles (Terraform, CI/CD, experiment management, data management)Intimate experience with ETL pipelines (Dataflow, Spark, Beam, Airflow, etc.)Intimate experience with data warehousing design (BigQuery, Cassandra, etc.)', 'Their vision is to become the default software for data scientists to manage data and train neural networks in the same way that GitHub or text editors are defaults for software engineers.', 'Build the world’s first data warehouse solution tailored to increasing ML development velocityHelp ML engineers around the world make sense of their model performanceContribute to a team culture obsessed with MLOpsDesign and optimize ETL pipelines + ML experimentation toolingDeliver on large scale features that impact customers using data-hungry ML in productionBuild a low-debt future for machine learning infrastructure by adhering to MLOps principlesContribute enhancements to an API used by numerous ML teams', 'I am on the market for a Senior ML Engineer with either strong startup chop and/or experience working at a Tier-1 tech company, and interest in scaling platforms with world-class colleagues. The Engineering team is currently growing from 30 to 50 this year, now is the time to get on-board!', 'Build the world’s first data warehouse solution tailored to increasing ML development velocity', 'Build a low-debt future for machine learning infrastructure by adhering to MLOps principles', 'On Offer:', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0• Very competitive on compensation, open to discussing\xa0', 'Intimate experience with MLOps principles (Terraform, CI/CD, experiment management, data management)', 'Contribute enhancements to an API used by numerous ML teams', 'Help ML engineers around the world make sense of their model performance', "What You'll Do:", 'Bachelors or Masters in CS preferred or equivalent experienceExcellent developer with experience building production-scale data pipelinesClear history of delivering on data warehousing solutions', "What You'll Bring:"]

job_title: Software Engineer in Big Data Infra
job_text: ['', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Build services to support Multi-tenant environment with 100+ PBs in Datasets. ', ' As an engineer you will be building services that can help operate and scale the infrastructure ', ' Experience with big data technologies like Spark ', ' Experience with big data technologies like Spark  Experience with GCP Big data services  Experience with DevOps methodologies and tools for automating and monitoring ', ' NOTE: If your name is hyphenated or has multiple capitalization, please use the same format as your government ID. ', 'Reference Number: ', ' A successful candidate will be a strong engineer who can be part of a high performance engineering team, with excellent communication skills, and an ability to deliver results in a fast paced environment. ', ' Job requirements ', ' What you will work on ', 'Job Description Summary', ' Excellent team player and great attitude. Willingness to understand and work through global software development approaches and inherent problems it surfaces ', ' Please Capitalize first letter of your First and Last Name. ', ' Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies. ', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Travel Percent', ' Knowledge and experience with cloud technologies ', ' Take responsibility for services you build ', ' Provide full legal First Name/Family Name – this is important for us to ensure our future hires have the right system set up. ', ' Experience with design and development of scalable services and platforms ', 'Who We Are', " We're a purpose-driven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom. ", ' Experience with DevOps methodologies and tools for automating and monitoring ', ' Work directly with Lead engineer, Architecture, Product Managers, Program Managers and stakeholders ', ' Analyze platform behavior to optimize resource usage and cost ', ' As an engineer you will be building services that can help operate and scale the infrastructure  Take responsibility for services you build  Work directly with Lead engineer, Architecture, Product Managers, Program Managers and stakeholders  Work directly with Product Managers, Program Managers, Data Scientists/Customers  Mentor engineers locally and globally  Analyze platform behavior to optimize resource usage and cost  Build services to support Multi-tenant environment with 100+ PBs in Datasets. ', ' Mentor engineers locally and globally ', 'Requirements', ' Please avoid using fully capitalized text for your First and/or Last Name. ', ' Work directly with Product Managers, Program Managers, Data Scientists/Customers ', 'Job Description', ' Provide full legal First Name/Family Name – this is important for us to ensure our future hires have the right system set up.  Please Capitalize first letter of your First and Last Name.  Please avoid using fully capitalized text for your First and/or Last Name.  NOTE: If your name is hyphenated or has multiple capitalization, please use the same format as your government ID. ', 'Subsidiary', ' Experience with GCP Big data services ', ' A successful candidate will be a strong engineer who can be part of a high performance engineering team, with excellent communication skills, and an ability to deliver results in a fast paced environment.  Excellent team player and great attitude. Willingness to understand and work through global software development approaches and inherent problems it surfaces  Experience with design and development of scalable services and platforms  3+ years’ experience in one or more of the following language: Golang (big plus), Java, C++, NodeJS, python and scripting.  Knowledge and experience with cloud technologies ', ' 3+ years’ experience in one or more of the following language: Golang (big plus), Java, C++, NodeJS, python and scripting. ']

['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'About Our Team', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

['', 'Application Process', 'Duties And Responsibilities', ' Experience working in estuarine environments is helpful but not required.Application ProcessThe application process for UW positions may include completion of a variety of online assessments to obtain additional information that will be used in the evaluation process. These assessments may include Work Authorization, Cover Letter and/or others. Any assessments that you need to complete will appear on your screen as soon as you select “Apply to this position”. Once you begin an assessment, it must be completed at that time; if you do not complete the assessment you will be prompted to do so the next time you access your “My Jobs” page. If you select to take it later, it will appear on your "My Jobs" page to take when you are ready.  Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed.', ' Puget Sound Institute', ' Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed.', 'Desired', ' The University of Washington Tacoma', ' Candidates must have an earned doctorate in environmental chemistry/engineering, oceanography, or closely related field and have demonstrated the ability to quantitatively describe chemical transport at the ecosystem scale, and three months of job-related experience.Desired', ' Aggregate, evaluate, and interpret large monitoring data sets to support the development of a deterministic, hydrodynamic water quality model and serve as the collaborative link between the modelers from Pacific Northwest Laboratories, who developed the Salish Sea Model, and water quality scientists and engineers from the UW Puget Sound Institute, Washington Department of Fish and Wildlife, and other stakeholders.', 'Requirements']

['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'About Our Team', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

care environment ', 'Comprehensive knowledge on health care industry, products, systems, business strategies and products ', 'Optimizing Engagement', 'POSITION SUMMARYYou would act as a cross-functional team lead working with business stakeholders, other analytics groups, and data engineering to launch test and learn pilots with a focus on measurability. You would provide mentoring and guidance in the development of mathematical and statistical approaches to study design and evaluation with the goal of promoting higher nurse engagement which will lead to better health outcomes and lower costs for our members. ', 'Establishes analytical rigor and statistical methods to analyze large amounts of data, using advanced statistical techniques and mathematical analyses ', 'Manage highly complex analytical projects from data exploration, model building, performance evaluation & testing ', 'Motivates team members and probes into technical details, and mentors others to do the same. ', 'A Business going through a $70 Billion-dollar merger yet with opportunities akin to a hypergrowth startup ', 'Provides guidance to develop enterprise-wide analytics strategy and roadmap ', 'Leads development and execution of new and/or highly complex machine learning algorithms and statistical predictive models and determines analytical approaches and modeling techniques to evaluate scenarios and potential future outcomes ', 'Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills ', '\xa0', 'Intelletec has teamed up with Healthcare firm whom are building the largest analytics capabilities in the US ']

['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'About Our Team', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

job_title: Data Analyst (Scientist and Engineer Level 3) with Security Clearance - Duke Field AFS
job_text: ['U.S. Citizenship is required.', 'Activities include participation in test execution, data collection and reduction, data analysis, assessing systems effectiveness, and test reporting.', 'Must be able to effectively communicate orally and possess technical writing skill.', 'Experience with the principles of Design of Experiments is desirable. Our EEO policy: Bevilacqua Research Corporation is an equal opportunity employer Minorities/Females/Disabled/Veterans and VEVRAA federal contractor. We recruit, employ, train, compensate, and promote without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin or any other basis protected by applicable federal, state or local law.', 'Test support includes recommendation of system performance requirements, development of test objectives, development of test methods and detailed test procedures, development of specification datarequirements, identification of instrumentation and test support equipment requirements, development of data collection forms and logs, coordination with test support agencies and ranges, and other test and evaluation (T&E) planning tasks.', 'Must be able to work as part of an integrated test team.', 'This skill level typically performs all functional duties independently.Must be a self-motivated expert able to take responsibility for identifying, organizing, coordinating, and executing necessary tasks to the successful accomplishment of assigned duties.', 'Familiarity with US Air Force test and evaluation processes is highly desirable.', "Bachelor's degree in applicable discipline and 3 - 10 years of related experience.Six years of applicable technical experience may be substituted for the BS degree (total 9 years) or four years' experience with an Associate's Degree (total 7 years).", 'Computer programming skills and experience working with MATLAB are required. Desired Experience:', 'Incorporates scientific principles and methods in test planning and execution.Works with Test Engineers to create required data products for test reporting.', 'Proficiency in the use of Microsoft Office applications including Excel is required.', 'Active Secret Clearance is required', 'Manages databases and analytic functions to ensure robust, secure, and responsive data control capability. Develops, maintains, and manages data tools to support the helicopter test teams.', 'Writes technical reports to address test results and findings.Provides technical advice and assistance to military test directors.', 'Reviews technical specifications and system design documents. Attends test planning meetings, technical interchange meetings, and system design reviews.', 'Supports the HH-60W Combat Rescue Helicopter (CRH) and MH-139 Strategic Defense Helicopter (SDH) developmental test & evaluation (DT&E) programs within the guidelines established in Government approved test procedures, method of test (MOT), and go or no-go criteria.', 'Travels to offsite locations as required and other duties as assigned. Minimum Requirements:']

Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'You are an influencer. ', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. job_title: Dietary Supplement and Pet Supplement Researcher and Formulator(Remote)
job_text: ['Currently looking for a contract researcher and formulator to assist my business with dietary supplements and pet supplement product development. Experience with both is desired but not required. Also looking for someone who has working knowledge of FDA regulations. Job hours are flexible and will pay up to $50/hr, but is a contract position. Ultimately, the person would transition into a project management role, and I am willing to train the right individual and will perform intense job training and mentorship when hired.', '', 'My business primarily focuses on pet and human dietary supplement formulation, manufacturing consulting, and regulatory compliance. Please see website or contact for more info. Thanks.', 'http://hydrosciencecf.com/']

['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

cutting edge techniques, technologies and potential business solutions.']

['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them. You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc). You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You are an influencer. You are an executor too. ', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'How To Really Knock Our Socks Off', 'You have experience guiding teams toward focusing on the most important research questions to answer, and creating mixed-method research plans for answering them.', 'About Our Team', 'We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2).', 'Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture.', 'Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research.', 'Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed.', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities.', 'We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here.', 'You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', 'We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills.', 'Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy.', 'You have worked with teams to create useful, research-backed foundational UX documents (e.g Journey Maps, Personas, etc).', 'You have a story or two about how design research can fail.', 'What It Takes To Catch Our Eye', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', ' Our executive leaders believe in the value that user research and design thinking can bring to a data driven culture. We have one of the best researcher to designer ratios in the industry (1:4, sometimes 1:2). We thrive on self-starters, there is no micromanagement around here. We are distributed. Ability to collaborate remotely is key, and we value strong communication skills. ', 'You are an influencer. You are an executor too.', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. ', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question.', 'You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data."', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You have a story or two about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation, and usability testing to creatively answer a question. You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. You have experience working closely with analytics or data science teams, generating "thick data." ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

You have a story or two about how design research can fail. You are comfortable leading Design Thinking workshops. You have a track record of effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. ', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. You get to identify and execute on research opportunities. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.  Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Lead and participate in Design Thinking workshops, ensuring teams are ideating with a background in user empathy. Translate customer insights into actionable recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis and design thinking workshops. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']

['', ' You have over 5 years of experience doing User Research. Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Hire and manage freelance researchers if deemed needed. ']
